晼字的基本解释

晼
wǎn
〔晼晚〕太阳将落山的样子，如“白日晼晼其将入兮。”

晼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wǎn］
［《廣韻》於阮切，上阮，影。］
(1)天晚，日偏西。
(2)比喻年老。参见“晼晚”。
(3)指时令晚。参见“晼晚”。

晼字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　晼； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页497第23
【廣韻】於阮切【集韻】委遠切，?音宛。景昳也。【楚辭·哀時命】白日晼晚其將入兮。

晼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
晼字的起名意思

天晚，日偏西，比喻年老。

Night
Basic explanation of words
Night
wǎn
〔晼晼〕The way the sun will set, such as "In the daytime, the sun will come in."
Night
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wǎn］
["Guang Yun" Yu Ruan Qi, Shang Ruan, shadow. ]
(1) At night, the sun is westward.
(2) An analogy of old age. See "Xiaowan".
(3) Refers to the late season. See "Xiaowan".
Night
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　晼; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 497 23
[Guang Yun] Yu Ruan Qi [Ji Yun] Wei Yuan cut,? Yin Wan. Jing Yan also. [Songs of the Chu·Sorrowful Life] He will enter Xi in the day and night.

Night
Name meaning
Late in the evening, the day is westward, which is a metaphor for old age.
